channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: 2ft x 1ft pothole in single track lane, 1st February
item.description:
On Foxcote lane (also known as Home Farm lane) halfway between telegraph poles 12C and 13C. Pothole has developed over the past few months.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 15 feet of crumbling roadside, near Chapel Cottage, 1st February
item.description:
About 15 yards uphill from Chapel Cottage, Foxcote. Problem started about a year ago and has progressively worsened since.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Banging man hole cover every time a car dives over it, 1st February

item.title: Road disintegrating, drains blocked, constant stream in road, 1st February
item.description:
Castle Street between Osbourne bridge and Sudeley gatehouse is now a real threat to drivers with large potholes, deep water, streams and blocked drains.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sudeley, Winchcombe
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: No rain in 24 hours - water has increased or remained the same

item.title: Old fence panel, 1st February
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 152, River Leys, Kingsditch, Cheltenham

item.title: Street light out by alleyway entrance next to coach house where marked on map., 1st February
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 20, Azalea Drive, Hatherley, Cheltenham

item.title: Impassable after heavy rain. Danger to children., 1st February
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 22, Southcourt Close, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
